DOC.brief_title: China PEACE 3 : Cardiovascular Health And Texting-Diabetes Mellitus ( CHAT-DM ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : This study aim evaluate effectiveness automate mobile phone text message-based intervention secondary prevention , include lifestyle modification , medication adherence improvement risk factor control among CHD patient diabetes . We hypothesize intervention use mobile phone text base education reminder improve risk factor control medication adherence CHD patient . Study design : The study two-arm , parallel , randomize clinical trial . Patients eligible documented CHD define history myocardial infarction percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) , history diabetes mellitus , capability read send short message , able provide inform consent . Patients exclude active mobile phone . The eligible participant allocate intervention control group 1:1 ratio randomly . The intervention group receive intervention pre-designed text message addition usual care , control group receive usual care . All participant follow 6 month . Study intervention : Participants intervention group receive text message 6 month well usual care . They receive one general message , one hypertension message , one glucose control message , one lifestyle message , one medication adherence message one physical activity message per week . Outcome measure : The primary endpoint change glycemic hemoglobin ( HbA1C ) measure central blood sample . Secondary endpoint include body mass index ( BMI ) , physical activity , medication adherence , blood pressure , low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) fast blood glucose ( FBG ) . Exploratory endpoint include long-term prognosis patient , death , nonfatal myocardial infarction , stroke , well health status ( SAQ EQ-5D ) . Statistical analysis : Evaluation carry intention-to-treat basis . Values analyze endpoint intervention group control group compare accord analysis plan . We 'll follow prespecified analysis plan subgroup analysis conduct accordingly .
